heading: For the disabled

licenseDesc.1: Class 1 vehicles are specially designed for persons suffering from a defect or disability.

sidenote: Class 1 license is only issued to people with disabilities.

heading: For all motorcycles
sidenote: You must have 2B license for a year before taking 2A test. You must also have 2A license for a year before taking Class 2 test.

heading: Up to 7 people & Unladen weight < 2,500 kg

licenseDesc.1: For both manual and auto transmission vehicles
Can only be used to drive auto transmission vehicles
For foreign workers with a work permit or S-Pass
licenseDesc.2: Only allows you to drive a car, and not other light-weight vehicles like vans
licenseDesc.3: Only theory test needs to be taken if you already have a driving license from your own country

licenseDesc.1: For foreign workers with a work permit or S-Pass
licenseDesc.2: Only theory test needs to be taken if you already have a auto-transmission driving license from your own country

heading: Buses, Trucks etc.

licenseDesc.1: For vehicles that weigh more than 2,500kg, but less than 7,250kg
licenseDesc.2: Includes buses, trucks, and most big vehicles

sidenote: Class 4A licenses are only for poeple who drive public buses.
